proper noun.description: A city in southern India, joint capital of the states of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana; population 4,025,300 (est. 2009).
A former large princely state in southern central India, divided in 1956 between Maharashtra, Mysore, and Andhra Pradesh.
A city in southeastern Pakistan, in the province of Sind, on the Indus River; population 1,536,400 (est. 2009).
